title: Victoria's Favourite Things. Segment 8
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
abstract: Cool threads, sleeping, Lord of the Rings and Yu Gi Oh Models
description: The results of July 2004's Open House weekend program 'Victoria's Favourite Things'. This segment features Madelaine talking about her love of clothes; Emma from Fitzroy's favourite thing is sleeping; Sarah, Melanie and Hayley from Cranbourne really dig Lord Of The Rings (and friendship); and Jack from Surrey Hills talks about his Yu Gi Oh Model Kit.
